title: AI risk assessment expert Ajeya Cotra says AI could lead to 10,000 years of progress in just 25 years
description: AI risk expert Ajeya Cotra warns that we may be underestimating how transformative artificial intelligence could become. She says AI could compress 10,000 years of technological progress into just 25 years if it begins automating research, software and physical production.
content: When it comes to artificial intelligence, what we’re seeing today could just be the tip of the iceberg. According to AI risk assessment expert Ajeya Cotra, we may be underestimating how powerful AI could become. She argues that if AI begins automatin... [3374 chars]

title: Which Decisions Should CEOs Be Comfortable Letting AI Influence in 2026?
description: Which Decisions Should CEOs Be Comfortable Letting AI Influence in 2026? Artificial intelligence is no longer a back-office tool—it is actively shaping executive decision-making. In 2026, the most effective CEOs understand that AI is not a replacement for leadership judgment, but a powerful decision-support system. title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI and Deep Tech Investment Surge in India: A 2025 Showcase
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.
